overview: Pepe Moco, a mentally handicapped boy, who makes an advert for one of  the presidential candidates who promises to organise the first World Cup  in Guatemala. Beto is a kid who scales a town drawn in chalk, venting his  spleen on its walls, threatening passersby with balls. The two of them soon  become very close evoking the past and present of a country that does  harm.
title: Even the Sun Has Spots
